Localizing small image patches For small patches (less than about 20 by 20) we provide an efficient estimator, PatchLocalizer . The two arguments to  patchlocalizer  are the maximum number of source the algorithm will estimate and the minimum drop in the loss function the algorithm will accept when adding a new source . When the drop in the squared loss function from adding a new source falls below  1E-1 , the algorithm will return the previously estimated sources .
